Unmarshalling etalon. 16:36:32:694 TRACE Etalon object: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <recipeBook xmlns="http://example.org/biscuits"> <recipe difficulty="EASY" created="2025-09-01T10:00:00" updated="2025-09-05T09:15:00"> <title>Classic Chocolate Biscuits</title> <ingredients> <name>Flour</name> <amount unit="g">250</amount> <allergens>GLUTEN EGGS</allergens> </ingredients> <ingredients> <name>Butter</name> <amount unit="g">100</amount> <allergens>MILK</allergens> </ingredients> <ingredients> <name>Cocoa Powder</name> <amount unit="g">50</amount> </ingredients> <sweetener> <sugar unit="g">80</sugar> </sweetener> <steps stepNumber="1"> <instruction>Sift flour and cocoa together.</instruction> <duration>5</duration> </steps> <steps stepNumber="2"> <instruction>Mix with butter until crumbly.</instruction> </steps> <steps stepNumber="3"> <instruction>Bake until crisp.</instruction> <duration>15</duration> </steps> <tray material="metal"> <length>30</length> <width>20</width> </tray> <chocolateBiscuit shape="ROUND" flour="WHEAT"> <cocoaContent>70</cocoaContent> </chocolateBiscuit> <recipeNotes language="en">Use a firm jam to avoid soggy centers.</recipeNotes> <biscuitNotes language="en">Cut a small vent in the top to prevent bubbling.</biscuitNotes> </recipe> <recipe difficulty="MEDIUM" created="2025-09-02T14:30:00" updated="2025-09-06T12:00:00"> <title>Jam-Filled Biscuits</title> <ingredients> <name>Flour</name> <amount unit="g">200</amount> <allergens>GLUTEN</allergens> </ingredients> <ingredients> <name>Butter</name> <amount unit="g">120</amount> <allergens>MILK</allergens> </ingredients> <ingredients> <name>Strawberry Jam</name> <amount unit="tbsp">3</amount> </ingredients> <sweetener> <honey unit="ml">50</honey> </sweetener> <steps stepNumber="1"> <instruction>Mix flour and butter into dough.</instruction> </steps> <steps stepNumber="2"> <instruction>Roll out and cut shapes.</instruction> </steps> <steps stepNumber="3"> <instruction>Add jam filling and bake.</instruction> <duration>other:untilGolden</duration> </steps> <tray material="ceramic"> <length>25</length> <width>25</width> </tray> <jamBiscuit shape="HEART" flour="RYE"> <jamFlavor>Strawberry</jamFlavor> </jamBiscuit> <recipeNotes language="en">Keep dough chilled 30 minutes before rolling.</recipeNotes> <biscuitNotes language="en">Store in an airtight container; best eaten within 3 days.</biscuitNotes> </recipe> </recipeBook>

created="2025-09-01T10:00:00.000" updated="2025-09-05T09:15:00.000" Hjid="1"> <title>Classic Chocolate Biscuits</title> <ingredients Hjid="1"> <name>Flour</name> <amount unit="g" Hjid="2">250</amount> <biscuitNotes language="en" Hjid="1">Cut a small vent in the top to prevent bubbling.</biscuitNotes> </recipe> <recipe difficulty="MEDIUM" created="2025-09-02T14:30:00.000"
